resources.string: Simply pick a test first then a game!
Create a test first, then add your questions! hit the back key to save
Who will win? pass the device back and forth and test your knowledge!
Who will win? pass the device back and forth and test your knowledge and your Tic-Tac-Toe Skills!

To get started simply create a test! The Test you create must have atleast 10 questions so hope you are prepared to learn! After you create your test just simply hit the back button and now you are ready to play. Tap on the games button and pick your test and pick your game and get ready to learn and have fun.
